title: 18 Rattan Things You Can Find on Amazon
text:
18 items in this article Photo: Retailer

Over the past year or so, rattan — a material derived from palm stems — has been popping up everywhere we look. Rattan chairs, lampshades, baskets, and trays appeared on the cover of the impeccably stylish British interior-design magazine The World of Interiors. Rattan candelabras and laundry baskets are on offer at West Elm. And a rattan bar cart even made it into our roundup of the best outdoor furniture for small spaces, according to designers. A natural rattan chair can make your living room feel a bit more like an exotic Balinese resort, and a washed white rattan headboard can make your bedroom feel more like a cozy bed and breakfast. Another nice thing about rattan furniture is that you don’t have to pay a premium to get the look — and in fact, many rattan pieces (that look a lot like those West Elm pieces, but cost much less) are available on Amazon. We scoured the site to find our favorite rattan things, all of which will bring some texture and warmth to any space you put them in.

Tabletop tray

AH American Homestead Vanity Tray This hand-woven tray would look as good holding bottles of perfume as it would holding spices on your kitchen countertop. $15 at Amazon Buy $15 at Amazon Buy

Placemats

LA Placemats Set of 4 If rattan furniture feels like too much of a commitment, these rattan placemats are an easy way to get in on the trend. $20 at Amazon Buy $20 at Amazon Buy

Dining chairs

Edloe Finch Set of 2 Mid-Century Modern Dining Room Chairs Velvet Cushions These dining chairs — which would work equally well as desk or living room chairs — are a mid-century spin on the trend. $242 at Amazon Buy $242 at Amazon Buy

Flatware tray

Foldable chair

Round tray

Lounge chair

Kneeling chair

BambooParkJapan Rattan Seiza Chair This Japanese kneeling chair is meant to help you maintain straight posture while sitting with your legs underneath you, but one Amazon reviewer says that they’ve used it as an under-desk foot rest, and another says that it’s a favorite place for their cat to curl up. $45 at Amazon Buy $45 at Amazon Buy

Three trays

I-lan Set of 3 Handmade Rattan Rectangle Serving Trays A rattan place for everything and everything in its rattan place. $45 at Amazon Buy $45 at Amazon Buy

Armchair

East at Main Franklin Rattan Occasional Chair A more traditional take on the rattan chair, this handcrafted one comes in a few neutral shades, and would make a fun-but-stately accent piece in a living room. $355 at Amazon Buy $355 at Amazon Buy

Foot stool

Side table

Kouboo La Jolla Round Handwoven Rattan Stool We like how sturdy this side table looks; at 18-inches high, you could also buy a few to use as as stools. $175 at Amazon Buy $175 at Amazon Buy

Serving tray

Pillow

BambooParkJapan Rattan Bed Pillow This pillow is handmade in Japan, and according to Amazon, makes a great summer pillow. If you think it looks too stiff for sleeping, you could still use it for reclining and lounging. $24 at Amazon Buy $24 at Amazon Buy

Headboard

Safavieh Home Collection Rattan Headboard Adding a headboard to your bed can change the feel of a room, not to mention making reading in bed at night more pleasant. This one has a B&B vibe to it, and if used in a guest room, might make your visitors feel like they’re staying at a cozy inn. $225 at Amazon Buy $225 at Amazon Buy

Twin size headboard

Eucatus Best Products and Gifts Teal Rattan Headboard A smaller headboard with a beachy aesthetic that will instantly brighten up a kid’s bedroom. $200 at Amazon Buy $200 at Amazon Buy
